tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_checks (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    trader_id INT,
    security VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_check_result BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_type VARCHAR(50),
    trade_quantity INT,
    trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_check_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_id INT NOT NULL,
    trade_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
    result_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    result_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trade (
    trade_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_amount NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    counterparty VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    approval_id INT REFERENCES regulatory_approval(id)
);
